mapper.select: select no, title, password , thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl , limited_user_count as limitedUserCount, created_at as createdAt, only_authorized as onlyAuthorized , searchable, owner from chat_room order by created_at desc

SELECT no, title, password, thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl, limited_user_count as limitedUserCount, created_at as createdAt, only_authorized as onlyAuthorized, searchable as searchable, owner FROM chat_room WHERE no = #{chatRoomNo }

SELECT no, title, password, thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl, limited_user_count as limitedUserCount, created_at as createdAt, only_authorized as onlyAuthorized, searchable, owner FROM chat_room WHERE no IN (SELECT chat_room_no FROM participant WHERE account_no = #{no}) LIMIT 10

SELECT no, title, password, thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl, limited_user_count as limitedUserCount, created_at as createdAt, only_authorized as onlyAuthorized, searchable, owner FROM chat_room where no in (select chat_room_no FROM chat_room_has_tag where tag_no = (select no from tag where tag like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')) OR title like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
select tag from tag where no in (select tag_no from chat_room_has_tag where chat_room_no = #{no})
